name: dubtrack.fm - Thinner text
description: For those who want Dubtrack to look more modern, all over.
additional_info: Information This style affects all of dubtrack's font elements, except for heading 3 (error / warning heading), dropdown box and dropdown menu. This also includes a fix for the import button, which makes it conform to the font used in dubtrack.fm. Use notes Do not use this to change the font used in dubtrack.fm; Since everything on the website is some piece of text (even the icons on the site), you'll break Dubtrack trying to do this. A later revision may resolve this, but for now this is exclusively to influence the weight of fonts on Dubtrack. Updates 12/15/15 Added letter spacing to make the text appear less compressed when thinned out. 12/16/15 Added class for menu dropdown to prevent letter spacing from making that look weird. 12/17/15Added video quality as an exception to make it not look so weird with the other icons in the player footer. 01/27/16 Changed font for import fix because Dubtrack changed their font.
